attributes.review:
My phone kept crashing so badly, once I deleted this app my phone stopped crashing 
So this app makes your phone crash
attributes.title: MY PHONE CRASHES

attributes.review: i got this app w the intention of making a delicious dinner for my family. i was EXTREMELY disappointed to discover this app has NO good recipes!!! if u r looking for a good dinner, this is NOT the app for you
attributes.title: NOT for cooking!!!

attributes.review: Just like your banning TikTok were gonna delete your “app” that makes phones lag, crash out of apps. Enjoy your app while it’s still UP!
attributes.title: Don’t ban TikTok!!

attributes.review: I was utterly disturbed. I saw an orange alien trying to sound professional. Did he even get a valid degree. This app was very upsetting, and glitches out every second.
attributes.title: Just no.

attributes.review: This app is obviously made by someone who supports old white men. It is slow and stupid, and purely racist. The Biden 2020 app is a much better alternative in my opinion.
attributes.title: Poorly made

attributes.review: Why would they ever make an app for a hot cheetos small weewee president. he’s so embarrassing for America. too many photos of a hot cheetos. not even that my phone got hacked. it started to glitch. so bad!
attributes.title: bad!

attributes.review: This app took three days to download, I had multiple problems with the app. Overall, it wasn’t helpful.
attributes.title: Trash app

attributes.review: Literally the worst app I’ve ever used in my life. It was worse than life 360 even. Never get this app it’s trash and just a waste of time. Not helpful at all!!
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: this app is terrible. the minute i try to enter my number to get into the app it crashes! i restart the app over a dozen times and it just barely got to work. after getting into the app it’s just so incredibly glitchy that it doesn’t even function correctly. this app gets one star.
attributes.title: not good

attributes.review: This app is straight up awful, as soon as I download it for our lord and savor 🍊orange🍊, it began to annoy the crap out of me so I deleted it so if you could please delete this ✨
attributes.title: Awful
